thread.title: just perfect , airy, fresh and excellent service
thread.title_full: just perfect , airy, fresh and excellent service - Review of Eight Restaurant, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Christine K
title: just perfect , airy, fresh and excellent service
text:
this was an excellent choice for a business meeting, polite and attentive staff but not around you all the time, clean, fresh look from all vantage points .
a good choice for every palette and on such a hot day salad that tasted as if it had just been picked , iced water refilled constantly .Could not get to the yummy puddings as the salad was more than sufficient .
